The Town of Huntington is in the Chittenden East School District.
Brewster Pierce Memorial School (Grades K – 4) in Huntington Center.

Camels Hump Middle School (Grades 5 – 8) in Richmond.
Mount Mansfield Union High School (Grades 9 – 12) in Jericho.
